title: Jett
content: Jett is an agent known for her incredible speed and agility. Her abilities allow her to dash through the battlefield, evade enemy fire, and reposition herself quickly. Jett's signature ability, Cloudburst, creates a cloud of smoke that obscures vision, making it perfect for escapes or tactical maneuvers. Her ultimate ability, Blade Storm, equips her with a set of highly accurate throwing knives that deal significant damage and can be thrown in quick succession or all at once for a powerful burst. Jett's mobility and precision make her a formidable opponent in any situation.

title: Phoenix
content: Phoenix is an agent who embodies the power of fire and rebirth. His abilities focus on dealing damage over time and providing self-healing. Phoenix's signature ability, Hot Hands, throws a fireball that creates a zone of fire, damaging enemies who pass through it. His ultimate ability, Run It Back, marks his current location and, if he dies during its duration, he will be resurrected at the marked spot with full health. Phoenix's aggressive playstyle and self-sustain make him a valuable asset in pushing objectives and securing kills.

title: Sage
content: Sage is a support agent who excels in healing and reviving her allies. Her abilities are crucial for maintaining team health and providing defensive utility. Sage's signature ability, Healing Orb, restores the health of an ally or herself over time. Her ultimate ability, Resurrection, allows her to revive a fallen teammate, bringing them back into the fight with full health. Sage's Barrier Orb creates a solid wall that can block enemy fire and movement, providing cover for her team. Her Slow Orb slows enemies caught in its area, making them easier targets. Sage's supportive capabilities make her an essential part of any team composition.

title: Brimstone
content: Brimstone is a tactical agent who specializes in area control and providing utility for his team. His abilities focus on creating zones of control and providing vision for his allies. Brimstone's signature ability, Sky Smoke, allows him to call in a series of smoke grenades that obscure vision in a large area. His ultimate ability, Orbital Strike, calls in a powerful laser strike that deals significant damage over time in a targeted area. Brimstone's Stim Beacon provides a damage boost to allies within its radius, making it ideal for coordinated pushes. His Incendiary grenade creates a field of fire that damages enemies over time. Brimstone's tactical prowess makes him a valuable asset in any team composition.

title: Sova
content: Sova is an agent who excels in reconnaissance and providing information for his team. His abilities focus on revealing enemy positions and creating opportunities for his allies. Sova's signature ability, Recon Bolt, fires an arrow that reveals the location of enemies caught in its area. His ultimate ability, Hunter's Fury, fires three powerful energy blasts that deal significant damage and reveal enemies hit by them. Sova's Owl Drone allows him to pilot a drone that can tag enemies, providing valuable information for his team. His Shock Bolt fires an arrow that emits a damaging pulse, dealing damage to enemies caught in its radius. Sova's reconnaissance capabilities make him an invaluable asset in any team composition.

title: Viper
content: Viper is an agent who specializes in controlling areas with her poisonous abilities. Her kit focuses on creating zones of control that restrict enemy movement and visibility. Viper's signature ability, Poison Cloud, throws a gas emitter that creates a cloud of poison, damaging enemies who pass through it. Her ultimate ability, Viper's Pit, creates a large field of poison that obscures vision and damages enemies within it. Viper's Snake Bite fires a projectile that creates a pool of poison, damaging and slowing enemies caught in it. Her Toxic Screen creates a line of poison gas emitters that form a wall, restricting enemy movement and vision. Viper's control over the battlefield makes her a formidable opponent in any situation.

title: Cypher
content: Cypher is an agent who excels in gathering information and controlling the battlefield with his technological abilities. His kit focuses on revealing enemy positions and creating traps to catch unsuspecting foes. Cypher's signature ability, Trapwire, places a tripwire that reveals and dazes enemies who trigger it. His ultimate ability, Neural Theft, reveals the location of all living enemies within a large radius. Cypher's Cyber Cage creates a zone that slows and reveals enemies who pass through it. His Spycam allows him to place a remote camera that can tag enemies, providing valuable information for his team. Cypher's ability to gather intelligence and control the battlefield makes him a valuable asset in any team composition.

title: Reyna
content: Reyna is an agent who thrives on eliminating enemies and gaining strength from her kills. Her abilities focus on self-sustain and increasing her combat effectiveness. Reyna's signature ability, Devour, consumes the soul of a nearby enemy corpse, healing her and providing a temporary health boost. Her ultimate ability, Empress, increases her firing speed, equip speed, and reload speed, and provides a temporary health boost. Reyna's Leer throws an ethereal eye that nearsights enemies who look at it, making them easier targets. Her Dismiss ability allows her to consume a soul orb, becoming intangible for a short duration. Reyna's aggressive playstyle and self-sustain make her a formidable opponent in any situation.

title: Killjoy
content: Killjoy is an agent who specializes in defending areas with her ingenious traps and devices. Her abilities focus on controlling the battlefield and providing utility for her team. Killjoy's signature ability, Alarmbot, places a bot that hunts down enemies who come within its range, applying a debuff that makes them vulnerable. Her ultimate ability, Lockdown, creates a device that detains all enemies caught in its radius, preventing them from using abilities or moving. Killjoy's Turret deploys a turret that fires at enemies within its line of sight, dealing damage over time. Her Nanoswarm grenade creates a field of nanobots that damage enemies within it. Killjoy's defensive capabilities make her an invaluable asset in any team composition.

title: Breach
content: Breach is an agent who specializes in disrupting enemy positions and creating opportunities for his team. His abilities focus on controlling the battlefield and providing utility for his allies. Breach's signature ability, Fault Line, creates a seismic blast that dazes and knocks up enemies caught in its path. His ultimate ability, Rolling Thunder, sends a cascade of quakes through walls, stunning and damaging enemies caught in its area. Breach's Flashpoint charges create a flash that blinds enemies who look at it, making them easier targets. His Aftershock ability sends a slow-acting burst through a wall, dealing damage to enemies on the other side. Breach's ability to disrupt enemy positions makes him a valuable asset in any team composition.
